entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.2°C
entry.summary:
